description: This file defines a ReservationsProvider class that manages in-memory reservations, providing methods to add, cancel, and query available reservation slots. It uses Flutter's ChangeNotifier to notify listeners of state changes.

classes.name: ReservationsProvider
classes.description: A provider managing reservations data with mock time slots, supporting add, cancel, and slot availability functionalities.

methods.name: addReservation
methods.description: Adds a new reservation to the in-memory list and notifies listeners.

methods.name: cancelReservation
methods.description: Removes a reservation by ID and notifies listeners.

methods.name: availableSlotsFor
methods.description: Returns a list of mock available time slots for a given day.
